TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Cache extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class Cache Implements IEnumerable
public ref class Cache sealed : System::Collections::IEnumerable

Docs.summary: Implements the cache for a Web application. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 一個執行個體，這個類別會建立每個應用程式網域，它會維持有效狀態，只要應用程式定義域會維持使用中。 此類別的執行個體的相關資訊可透過`Cache`的屬性<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>物件或`Cache`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>物件。
> [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>類別並不適用於 ASP.NET 應用程式以外的使用。 設計和測試以提供 Web 應用程式的快取的 ASP.NET 中使用。 對於其他類型的應用程式，例如主控台應用程式或 Windows Forms 應用程式，使用<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache>類別。
## Examples 下列範例會快取中的項目指派的值會顯示使用者的頁面，並再從快取中移除項目時通知他們。 它會建立`RemovedCallback`方法，其中有簽章的`CacheItemRemovedCallback`委派，會移除快取項目，並使用時通知使用者<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedReason>告訴他們移除原因的列舉。 此外，它會使用<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Item%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性將物件加入至快取，並擷取這些物件的值。 在 `AddItemToCache`方法，它會使用<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法新增至快取的項目。 若要使用`CacheItemRemovedCallback`委派，必須使用此方法將項目新增至快取或<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Insert%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，因此，ASP.NET 可以自動進行適當的方法呼叫時移除的項目。 自訂`RemoveItemFromCache`方法會使用<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Remove%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來明確地從快取中刪除項目造成`RemovedCallback`要叫用方法。
> [!NOTE] > 由下列程式碼片段存取快取的執行個體屬於<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>這個範例會繼承的物件。
[!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Caching Examples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/CS/cachecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Caching Examples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/VB/cachevb.aspx#1)]

Docs.threadsafe: 此型別具備執行緒安全。

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public object Add (string key, object value, System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency dependencies, DateTime absoluteExpiration, TimeSpan slidingExpiration, System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority priority, System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedCallback onRemoveCallback);

.method public hidebysig instance object Add(string key, object value, class System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency dependencies, valuetype System.DateTime absoluteExpiration, valuetype System.TimeSpan slidingExpiration, valuetype System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority priority, class System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedCallback onRemoveCallback) cil managed

Public Function Add (key As String, value As Object, dependencies As CacheDependency, absoluteExpiration As DateTime, slidingExpiration As TimeSpan, priority As CacheItemPriority, onRemoveCallback As CacheItemRemovedCallback) As Object

public: System::Object ^ Add(System::String ^ key, System::Object ^ value, System::Web::Caching::CacheDependency ^ dependencies, DateTime absoluteExpiration, TimeSpan slidingExpiration, System::Web::Caching::CacheItemPriority priority, System::Web::Caching::CacheItemRemovedCallback ^ onRemoveCallback);
member this.Add : string * obj * System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency * DateTime * TimeSpan * System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority * System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedCallback -> obj
MemberSignature.Usage: cache.Add (key, value, dependencies, absoluteExpiration, slidingExpiration, priority, onRemoveCallback)

Docs.param: The cache key used to reference the item.
The item to be added to the cache.
The file or cache key dependencies for the item. When any dependency changes, the object becomes invalid and is removed from the cache. If there are no dependencies, this parameter contains .
The time at which the added object expires and is removed from the cache. If you are using sliding expiration, the absoluteExpiration parameter must be .

The interval between the time the added object was last accessed and the time at which that object expires. If this value is the equivalent of 20 minutes, the object expires and is removed from the cache 20 minutes after it is last accessed. If you are using absolute expiration, the slidingExpiration parameter must be .

The relative cost of the object, as expressed by the enumeration. The cache uses this value when it evicts objects; objects with a lower cost are removed from the cache before objects with a higher cost.
A delegate that, if provided, is called when an object is removed from the cache. You can use this to notify applications when their objects are deleted from the cache.
Docs.summary: Adds the specified item to the object with dependencies, expiration and priority policies, and a delegate you can use to notify your application when the inserted item is removed from the .
Docs.returns: An object that represents the item that was added if the item was previously stored in the cache; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 當呼叫此方法具有相同的項目，將會失敗`key`參數儲存在`Cache`。 若要覆寫現有`Cache`項目使用相同`key`參數，請使用<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Insert%2A>方法。
您不能同時設定`absoluteExpiration`和`slidingExpiration`參數。 如果您想在特定時間到期的快取項目時，您會設定`absoluteExpiration`參數，以特定的時間，而`slidingExpiration`參數來<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoSlidingExpiration>。
如果您想要的快取項目在一段時間之後過期後經過上次存取項目，則將`slidingExpiration`到期時間間隔的參數和`absoluteExpiration`參數來<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration>。
## Examples 下列範例會建立`AddItemToCache`方法。 呼叫這個方法時，它會設定`itemRemoved`屬性，以`false`，並註冊`onRemove`方法的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedCallback>委派。 委派的簽章用於`RemovedCallback`方法。 `AddItemToCache`方法會接著檢查相關聯的值`Key1`快取中的索引鍵。 如果值為`null`，則`Add`方法將項目放在快取索引鍵為`Key1`，值為`Value 1`，絕對期限為 60 秒，而高的快取的優先順序。 它也會使用`onRemove`做為引數的方法。 這可讓`RemovedCallback`從快取中移除此項目時要呼叫的方法。
> [!NOTE] > 如需如何使用的範例<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency>類別和<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedCallback>委派，請參閱[快取應用程式資料](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/206f977d-7860-4d20-bdd5-c3b3d8479f3d)。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching Examples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/CS/cachecs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching Examples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/VB/cachevb.aspx#3)]

Docs.exception: The or parameter is set to .
The parameter is set to less than or more than one year.
The and parameters are both set for the item you are trying to add to the .

Docs.summary: Gets the number of items stored in the cache.
Docs.value: 快取中所儲存的項目數。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 監視您的應用程式效能時，或使用 ASP.NET 追蹤功能時，這個屬性可以是很有用。
## Examples 下列範例會取得的值`Count`屬性，將它轉換為字串，並將字串指派給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label.Text%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>Web 伺服器控制項`Label1`。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching.Cache.Count#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.Cache.Count/CS/cachecountcs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching.Cache.Count#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.Cache.Count/VB/cachecountvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public long EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit { get; }
.property instance int64 EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit
Public ReadOnly Property EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit As Long
public: property long EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit { long get(); };
member this.EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit : int64

Docs.summary: Gets the percentage of physical memory that can be consumed by an application before ASP.NET starts removing items from the cache.
Docs.value: 應用程式可用的實體記憶體的百分比。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit%2A>屬性會傳回所使用的應用程式的實體記憶體的百分比。 可用百分比低時，快取演算法就會開始移除快取中的項目。
<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit%2A>屬性可以設定具有`percentagePhysicalMemoryUsedLimit`屬性[快取項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的快取](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68fa0040-5abf-4c73-93fc-17e3c6af3299)應用程式的組態檔中的項目。 如果`percentagePhysicalMemoryUsedLimit`屬性未設定，快取演算法決定快取的大小上限和<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit%2A>計算屬性。
<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

MemberSignature.Value: public long EffectivePrivateBytesLimit { get; }
.property instance int64 EffectivePrivateBytesLimit
Public ReadOnly Property EffectivePrivateBytesLimit As Long
public: property long EffectivePrivateBytesLimit { long get(); };
member this.EffectivePrivateBytesLimit : int64

Docs.summary: Gets the number of bytes available for the cache.
Docs.value: 快取可用的位元組數目。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.EffectivePrivateBytesLimit%2A>屬性會傳回可由應用程式處理序的位元組數目。 一旦達到此限制時，快取演算法就會開始積極地清除快取。
<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.EffectivePrivateBytesLimit%2A>屬性可以設定具有`privateBytesLimit`屬性[快取項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的快取](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68fa0040-5abf-4c73-93fc-17e3c6af3299)應用程式的組態檔中的項目。 當`privateBytesLimit`屬性未設定，快取演算法決定快取的大小上限和<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.EffectivePrivateBytesLimit%2A>屬性包含演算法所選擇的大小。
## Examples <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit%2A>

remarks.format:
## Remarks 項目可以加入或移除快取，而這個方法會列舉項目。
## Examples 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator>物件， `CacheEnum`，並使用`GetEnumerator`方法。 列舉值會移到快取中，將每個快取項目的值轉換為字串，，然後將值寫入至 Web Form 網頁。
[!code-csharp[Cache.GetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Cache.GetEnumerator/CS/getenumcs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Cache.GetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Cache.GetEnumerator/VB/getenumvb.aspx#1)]

Docs.summary: Inserts an item into the object. Use one of the versions of this method to overwrite an existing item with the same parameter.

Public Sub Insert (key As String, value As Object)

member this.Insert : string * obj -> unit

Docs.param: The cache key used to reference the item.
The object to be inserted into the cache.
Docs.summary: Inserts an item into the object with a cache key to reference its location, using default values provided by the enumeration.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫現有的快取項目索引鍵符合`key`參數。 使用這個多載的快取中加入的物件`Insert`方法使用沒有檔案或快取相依性，優先順序為插入<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority.Default>，滑動期限值<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoSlidingExpiration>，和絕對逾期值的<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration>。
## Examples 下列範例示範如何將應用程式的快取中插入項目。
[!code-csharp[Classic Cache.Insert Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.Insert Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Docs.param: The cache key used to identify the item.
The object to be inserted in the cache.

The file or cache key dependencies for the inserted object. When any dependency changes, the object becomes invalid and is removed from the cache. If there are no dependencies, this parameter contains .
Docs.summary: Inserts an object into the that has file or key dependencies.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫現有的快取項目索引鍵符合`key`參數。 使用這個多載的快取中加入的物件`Insert`方法使用沒有檔案或快取相依性，優先順序為插入<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority.Default>，滑動期限值<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoSlidingExpiration>，和絕對逾期值的<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration>。
## Examples 下列範例示範如何插入應用程式的快取的快取相依性 XML 組態檔中的項目。
[!code-csharp[Classic Cache.Insert1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.Insert1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void Insert (string key, object value, System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency dependencies, DateTime absoluteExpiration, TimeSpan slidingExpiration);

.method public hidebysig instance void Insert(string key, object value, class System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency dependencies, valuetype System.DateTime absoluteExpiration, valuetype System.TimeSpan slidingExpiration) cil managed
Public Sub Insert (key As String, value As Object, dependencies As CacheDependency, absoluteExpiration As DateTime, slidingExpiration As TimeSpan)
public: void Insert(System::String ^ key, System::Object ^ value, System::Web::Caching::CacheDependency ^ dependencies, DateTime absoluteExpiration, TimeSpan slidingExpiration);
member this.Insert : string * obj * System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency * DateTime * TimeSpan -> unit

Docs.param: The cache key used to reference the object.
The object to be inserted in the cache.

The file or cache key dependencies for the inserted object. When any dependency changes, the object becomes invalid and is removed from the cache. If there are no dependencies, this parameter contains .

The time at which the inserted object expires and is removed from the cache. To avoid possible issues with local time such as changes from standard time to daylight saving time, use rather than for this parameter value. If you are using absolute expiration, the slidingExpiration parameter must be .

The interval between the time the inserted object is last accessed and the time at which that object expires. If this value is the equivalent of 20 minutes, the object will expire and be removed from the cache 20 minutes after it was last accessed. If you are using sliding expiration, the absoluteExpiration parameter must be .
Docs.summary: Inserts an object into the with dependencies and expiration policies.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫現有`Cache`具有相同的項目`key`參數。
如果`slidingExpiration`參數設為<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoSlidingExpiration>，滑動期限已停用。 如果您設定`slidingExpiration`大於參數<xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero>，則`absoluteExpiration`參數設為<xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A>再中包含的值加上`slidingExpiration`參數。 如果項目會從快取要求之前所指定的時間量`absoluteExpiration`參數，該項目會放在快取一次，並`absoluteExpiration`再次設定為`DateTime.Now`plus 中包含的值`slidingExpiration`參數。 如果項目未要求從快取中的日期之前`absoluteExpiration`參數，此項目會從快取移除。 。 使用這個多載插入方法的快取中加入的項目會插入優先順序為<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority.Default>。
## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用絕對期限的應用程式的快取中插入項目。
> [!NOTE] > 因為這種形式的`Insert`方法中將支援快取相依性，如果此項目沒有相依性，您必須宣告`dependency`做為參數`null`(`Nothing` Visual Basic 中) 以逗號分隔清單中的參數。
[!code-csharp[Classic Cache.Insert2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert2 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.Insert2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert2 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
下列範例示範如何將項目插入快取具有滑動期限。
[!code-csharp[Classic Cache.Insert2 Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert2 Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.Insert2 Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert2 Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void Insert (string key, object value, System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency dependencies, DateTime absoluteExpiration, TimeSpan slidingExpiration, System.Web.Caching.CacheItemUpdateCallback onUpdateCallback);

.method public hidebysig instance void Insert(string key, object value, class System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency dependencies, valuetype System.DateTime absoluteExpiration, valuetype System.TimeSpan slidingExpiration, class System.Web.Caching.CacheItemUpdateCallback onUpdateCallback) cil managed
Public Sub Insert (key As String, value As Object, dependencies As CacheDependency, absoluteExpiration As DateTime, slidingExpiration As TimeSpan, onUpdateCallback As CacheItemUpdateCallback)

public: void Insert(System::String ^ key, System::Object ^ value, System::Web::Caching::CacheDependency ^ dependencies, DateTime absoluteExpiration, TimeSpan slidingExpiration, System::Web::Caching::CacheItemUpdateCallback ^ onUpdateCallback);
member this.Insert : string * obj * System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency * DateTime * TimeSpan * System.Web.Caching.CacheItemUpdateCallback -> unit
MemberSignature.Usage: cache.Insert (key, value, dependencies, absoluteExpiration, slidingExpiration, onUpdateCallback)

Docs.param: The cache key that is used to reference the object.
The object to insert into the cache.
The file or cache key dependencies for the item. When any dependency changes, the object becomes invalid and is removed from the cache. If there are no dependencies, this parameter contains .

The time at which the inserted object expires and is removed from the cache. To avoid possible issues with local time such as changes from standard time to daylight saving time, use instead of for this parameter value. If you are using absolute expiration, the slidingExpiration parameter must be set to .

The interval between the time that the cached object was last accessed and the time at which that object expires. If this value is the equivalent of 20 minutes, the object will expire and be removed from the cache 20 minutes after it was last accessed. If you are using sliding expiration, the absoluteExpiration parameter must be set to .
A delegate that will be called before the object is removed from the cache. You can use this to update the cached item and ensure that it is not removed from the cache.
Docs.summary: Inserts an object into the object together with dependencies, expiration policies, and a delegate that you can use to notify the application before the item is removed from the cache.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Insert%2A>方法可讓您快取中插入新項目，並提供從快取移除項目之前呼叫的委派。 在委派中，您可以更新快取的項目，並藉此防止它從快取中移除。
這個方法會覆寫現有`Cache`具有相同的項目`key`參數。
您不能同時設定`absoluteExpiration`和`slidingExpiration`參數。 如果您想在特定時間到期的快取項目時，您會設定`absoluteExpiration`參數，以特定的時間，而`slidingExpiration`參數來<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoSlidingExpiration>。
如果您想要的快取項目上次被存取在一段時間的項目之後過期，則將`slidingExpiration`參數的到期間隔，以及您設定`absoluteExpiration`參數來<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration>。

Docs.exception: You set the parameter to less than or the equivalent of more than one year.
The and parameters are both set for the item you are trying to add to the . -or- The parameter is , and the parameter is set to , and the parameter is set to .

MemberSignature.Value: public void Insert (string key, object value, System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency dependencies, DateTime absoluteExpiration, TimeSpan slidingExpiration, System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority priority, System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedCallback onRemoveCallback);

.method public hidebysig instance void Insert(string key, object value, class System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency dependencies, valuetype System.DateTime absoluteExpiration, valuetype System.TimeSpan slidingExpiration, valuetype System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority priority, class System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedCallback onRemoveCallback) cil managed

Public Sub Insert (key As String, value As Object, dependencies As CacheDependency, absoluteExpiration As DateTime, slidingExpiration As TimeSpan, priority As CacheItemPriority, onRemoveCallback As CacheItemRemovedCallback)

public: void Insert(System::String ^ key, System::Object ^ value, System::Web::Caching::CacheDependency ^ dependencies, DateTime absoluteExpiration, TimeSpan slidingExpiration, System::Web::Caching::CacheItemPriority priority, System::Web::Caching::CacheItemRemovedCallback ^ onRemoveCallback);
member this.Insert : string * obj * System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency * DateTime * TimeSpan * System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority * System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedCallback -> unit
MemberSignature.Usage: cache.Insert (key, value, dependencies, absoluteExpiration, slidingExpiration, priority, onRemoveCallback)

Docs.param: The cache key used to reference the object.
The object to be inserted in the cache.
The file or cache key dependencies for the item. When any dependency changes, the object becomes invalid and is removed from the cache. If there are no dependencies, this parameter contains .

The time at which the inserted object expires and is removed from the cache. To avoid possible issues with local time such as changes from standard time to daylight saving time, use rather than for this parameter value. If you are using absolute expiration, the slidingExpiration parameter must be .

The interval between the time the inserted object was last accessed and the time at which that object expires. If this value is the equivalent of 20 minutes, the object will expire and be removed from the cache 20 minutes after it was last accessed. If you are using sliding expiration, the absoluteExpiration parameter must be .

The cost of the object relative to other items stored in the cache, as expressed by the enumeration. This value is used by the cache when it evicts objects; objects with a lower cost are removed from the cache before objects with a higher cost.
A delegate that, if provided, will be called when an object is removed from the cache. You can use this to notify applications when their objects are deleted from the cache.
Docs.summary: Inserts an object into the object with dependencies, expiration and priority policies, and a delegate you can use to notify your application when the inserted item is removed from the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫現有`Cache`具有相同的項目`key`參數。
您不能同時設定`absoluteExpiration`和`slidingExpiration`參數。 如果您想在特定時間到期的快取項目時，您會設定`absoluteExpiration`參數，以特定的時間，而`slidingExpiration`參數來<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoSlidingExpiration>。
如果您想要的快取項目在一段時間之後過期後，已經過前次存取項目，則設定`slidingExpiration`到期時間間隔的參數和`absoluteExpiration`參數來<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration>。
## Examples 下列範例示範如何插入您的應用程式時，指派項目高優先順序`Cache`物件。
> [!NOTE] > 如需有關如何使用這個方法搭配<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedCallback>委派，請參閱 <<c2> [ 如何： 通知應用程式時移除項目從快取](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/38c33aa0-afe9-40ba-a1a4-1ebab95286ef)。
[!code-csharp[Classic Cache.Insert3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert3 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.Insert3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert3 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Docs.exception: You set the parameter to less than or the equivalent of more than one year.
The and parameters are both set for the item you are trying to add to the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性，擷取指定的快取項目值或項目和一個索引鍵將它新增至快取。 新增項目使用的快取<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Item%2A>屬性就相當於呼叫<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Insert%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。
## Examples 下列範例會使用`Item`屬性，以擷取快取的物件相關聯的值`Key1`索引鍵。 然後它會使用<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Write%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以寫入 Web Form 網頁中的值和簡介文字和 B HTML 項目。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching Examples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/CS/cachecs.aspx#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching Examples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/VB/cachevb.aspx#5)]
下列範例示範如何使用這個屬性的值的文字方塊中插入快取。
[!code-csharp[Classic Cache.this Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.this Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.this Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.this Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static readonly DateTime NoAbsoluteExpiration;
.field public static initonly valuetype System.DateTime NoAbsoluteExpiration
Public Shared ReadOnly NoAbsoluteExpiration As DateTime
public: static initonly DateTime NoAbsoluteExpiration;
staticval mutable NoAbsoluteExpiration : DateTime

Docs.summary: Used in the parameter in an method call to indicate the item should never expire. This field is read-only.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用時，此欄位會設定`absoluteExpiration`參數等於<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>，它是常數表示的最大的可能`DateTime`值，12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM。
## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用`NoAbsoluteExpiration`欄位，以插入中的項目時，停用絕對期限`Cache`。
[!code-csharp[Classic Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static readonly TimeSpan NoSlidingExpiration;
.field public static initonly valuetype System.TimeSpan NoSlidingExpiration
Public Shared ReadOnly NoSlidingExpiration As TimeSpan
public: static initonly TimeSpan NoSlidingExpiration;
staticval mutable NoSlidingExpiration : TimeSpan

Docs.summary: Used as the parameter in an or method call to disable sliding expirations. This field is read-only.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用時，此欄位會設定`slidingExpiration`參數來<xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=nameWithType>常數的值為零的欄位。 按照所使用的快取的項目到期`absoluteExpiration`相關聯的參數`Insert`或`Add`方法呼叫。
## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用 Insert 方法將項目加入<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>物件使用`NoSlidingExpiration`欄位。
[!code-csharp[Classic Cache.NoSlidingExpiration Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.NoSlidingExpiration Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.NoSlidingExpiration Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.NoSlidingExpiration Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format:
## Examples 下列範例會建立`RemoveItemFromCache`方法。 當呼叫這個方法時，它會使用<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Item%2A>檢查快取是否包含物件相關聯的屬性`Key1`機碼值。 若是如此，`Remove`移除的物件呼叫方法。
